Comentario: This was the second of three sodas that we tried on our visit to Jaco town and it did not disappoint. Four of us went and had a quick dinner one evening here. Apparently, the taxi driver pulled a mini-scam on us, indicating that Garabito and Rustico were both closed at 7pm even though they really closed at 8pm. We should have went with our gut instinct, but I digress. The food here was great as well. The fried fish was juicier than the one I had at Rustico. The meals were 2,500 CRC and it came with flavored rice, beans, your choice of meat and a fruit drink. We ordered our food in takeout containers just in case we couldn’t finish but the portion sizes were a touch smaller and I managed to polish off my meal, while the ladies in our group took home leftovers. We also ordered chicken entrees for our other friends who stayed back (fried chicken and chicken in cream sauce). The chicken in cream sauce was well received by my wife and friend and my other buddy said the fried chicken tasted like KFC. Keep in mind if you get your drink to go, it will be poured into a bag!! Overall, the meal was great, but in evaluating the venues, we did feel this place was a notch lower than Soda Rustico or Soda Garabito, the other restaurants we tried. That said I would say this is a solid 4-4.5/5, the cheapest of the three sodas we tried and the meal was still generous in size albeit a touch smaller portions. You still can’t go wrong with these guys for exceptional value and delicious food.Please kindly indicate if this review was helpful as it would be greatly appreciated and help me focus my future efforts!

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Siempre es agradable comer frente al mar, el personal siempre nos recibe ameno, amigable, respetuoso y cálido!Ofrecen diferentes opciones de comidas y siempre quedamos satisfechos con las porciones y el sabor!El ambiente es súper tranquilo aún si hay niños, hay espacio para todos y ahorita cumplen rigurosamente con todas las normas del ministerio de salud! En varias ocasiones vimos al personal limpiando y desinfectando todas las áreas más utilizadas por los clientes! Sin duda lo recomiendo!

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Este restaurante frente al mar nos ofreció un buen servicio y comida rica pero no espectacular. Pedí un trio de ceviche peruano y tenia maíz amarillo. Los demás comensales pidieron una mariscada que estaba bastante buena y en general un sabor promedio y cervezas frías.

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: La calidad y cantidad de los alimentos muy acordé a sus excelente preciosa los felicito el ambiente y su personal super amable y coordinal

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Fuimos a cenar y la comida estaba deliciosa. Pedimos tiradito de corvina y ceviche de corvina estaba muy fresco y tenia todo el sabor tradicional peruano con buen aji , camote y maiz. Esa noche habia musica en vivo muy buena q matizo la noche. El servicio muy oportuno.

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Buena ubicación, fuera del bullicio de la ciudad aunque esté a 100 metros de la calle principal. Volumen de la música que permite la conversación. Vista al mar. Las tres entradas que pedimos fueron entregadas a buen tiempo. Buena presentación de los platos. Buen logro culinario del ceviche a la peruana, de la causa limeña de camarón y del aguacate relleno de camarón. Las copas de vino son abundantes.

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Restaurante ubicado frente a la playa de Jacó.Pasamos a disfrutar de un buen desayuno americano.Muy buen servicio y atención.

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: La peor comida de toda mi estancia en Costa Rica con diferencia, y ademas muy cara. Fui con 2 amigas y a ninguna nos gusto. Yo me pedí Corvina a la parrilla con verduras y puré de patata. Primero de todo, la Corvina no sabía a nada (seguro la habían descongelado!!), una porción muy pequeña, y lo peor de todo que no era ni a la parrilla, estaba frita!!!! La porción de verduras y puré de patata también muy escasa, tanto que me saqué un tupper que me había llevado de pasta y comí eso. No vayáis!!!! Mi amiga intentó cambiar su plato pero no le dejaron ya que supuestamente ya estaba cocinado, lo cual lo dudo, ya que tardaron bastante... NADA RECOMENDABLE, SEGURO QUE HAY SITIOS MEJORES!!!Pd: Es el primer post que hago en negativo ya que estoy contenta con todos los sitios a los que he ido, pero este fue horroroso, y pagué 16 dolares, que dolor!!!!

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Ambiente tranquilo, super agradable, la comida deliciosa, económico..... un lugar perfecto para un almuerzo o una cena con una vista de la puesta del sol....

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Aunque la comida es buena, las tres familias que estabamos ahí y en general en Jacó, fuimos "robadas" pues los saloneros se quedan con el cambio a pesar de que la propina ya está incluída. Tanto que una familia pagó una soda de lata y no le devolvieron nada de los 20 dólares que le dió al mesero, cuando la soda no costaba más de 3. Nosotros llamamos al gerente por la misma situación aunque un consumo mayor. El salonero no me dejó ver la cuenta ni la factura sino que fue él quien me comentó el total y desde ahí me pareció sospechoso. Cuando le reclamamos que se había quedado con el cambio, casí nos avienta el dinero en monedas (colones) a pesar de que la mayoría les pagan en dólares. Tanto esperamos para una mesa y tanta molestia, no vale la pena, mucho cuidado en Jacó pues este restaurante y la situación es una generalidad del lugar.

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: The Peruvian restaurant was the only positive thing about the Hotel Balcón del Mar. The service was very good. We ordered Salto de pollo and Pollo agridulce and they were both delicious. My husband and I enjoyed our dinner there as well as the view of the waves crashing on the beach. We also enjoyed our Tico style breakfast. The prices were fair for the amount and quality of the food. The servers were very polite and accommodating. We will eat here the next time we visit Jacó.

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: they need to pay just a little more attention to details.We had to wait around 20 mins to get dessert.It took them quite a while to prepare the check.

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Staff friendly and helpful. Menu had nothing special. The red snapper was dried out in the cooking. A great disappointment. Lettuce in salad tasted bitter as in too long in the sun. At no other restaurant did we experience this.

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: The restaurant opened to the beach and the pool area. The food was really delicious. It was our first experience with Peruvian cuisine. The flavors were amazing! The chaufa rice was cooked perfectly. The fried whole sea bass was so good! Pricing is comparable to other restaurants in Jaco, but the taste! Superb. We stayed in Jacobfor two weeks so we ate at several different restaurants. Even after we moved hotels, we still went back to eat there.

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Was with an OAT group and had a limited menu-- but everyone liked their meals. We all had the green plantain appetizer which was amazing. I had Arroz con Canerones (shrimp and rice) that was delicious. Others had sea bass and liked it as well. It should be noted that their seafood is very fresh since it is supplied by the local fish cooperative.

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: We are a group of 6 that regularly eat seafood and fish and were pleasantly surprised by the quality of the snook we ordered. Had it grilled, garlic butter and fried and all were great. The margaritas were delicious with plenty of tequila. Good service and a friendly waiter.

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: We stopped at this restaurant because it offered a beautiful view of the Pacific while we ate. We were all pleasantly surprised by the quality of the seafood. My son and I ordered the tuna steaks as recommended by the waiter and were not disappointed. My other son had the Snapper and my husband had the Sea Bass. All were good choices and cooked to perfection. Do not pass by without eating here!

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: We stopped here two times, both meals were great. Diego and Daniel, (cousins) were our waiters and they took great care of us. There were four of us and all of our meals were superb. The price was right in line for the quantity and quality of the food. When we are in this area again we will have a great meal with Diego and Daniel.

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: We had a nice meal after a private boat ride in tarcoles and Santiago was a great boat driver . The food was great and we had a great walk on the beach.

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: If your looking for a condo with lots of elbow room this would be a great place. Facilities are clean, big bathrooms, rooms, kitchen, 2 patios were very big. Maid service each day was good as well. Some appliances didn't work. Dishwasher and blender, they replaced blender, second one didn't work either. View was pretty good, somewhat obstructed by casino. Also if you go to bed early the casino bar could keep you up for awhile. They had an incredible fireworks display on new years eve. Lasted about 20-25 min.Overall we were happy with the stay, would rather have something with a better view that is more on the beach.

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: We stopped here for lunch as part of our tour and found it was quite delicious! It was very busy, but since our tour operator called ahead, we had no problems or wait to sit and get our food. My meal was fresh fish with rice and beans and it was delicious! My husband had pork with rice and beans which was only ok. He wished he had the fish. As a bonus, we saw scarlet macaws in the trees outside the restaurant.

Tipo_Comida: Peruana, Cajún y criolla, Mariscos, Sudamericana
Direccion: En el Hotel Balcón del Mar, Jaco, Costa Rica Frente al mar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Terrible... The food,, the coctails, the service and totally overpriced. I so regret going there. My tenderloin was over cooked,  service was very Slow and the coctails were lacking ice.

Nombre: Cafe Napoli - Wood Fired Italian Bistro
Direccion: Il Galeone Commercial Center 50 meters north of Pops ice-cream, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Despite service being a little slow, the food was really good.Great pasta and great salmon.It's really cool that the oven is outside and you can see the cooking process

Nombre: Cafe Napoli - Wood Fired Italian Bistro
Direccion: Il Galeone Commercial Center 50 meters north of Pops ice-cream, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Overall, we had a decent experience here. We came for breakfast, and waited on the patio for them to open up. They had a delicious looking menu outside showing all the brunch options, but unfortunately when we talked to the workers, they only had three or four options available - just photos on an ipad without descriptions. The server was polite enough but seemed like it was forced - like he was over tourists talking to him. The food was actually pretty great once we got it, but it was annoying to get up and go over to the coffee pot anytime we wanted a refill...tableside service was pretty limited. When we first got there(before they were officially open) they were playing a great latin playlist, but as soon as they were open they switched over to Jack Johnson only. I mean, I get it, it's a beach town, but we are in central america! Keep the latin music going!

Nombre: Cafe Napoli - Wood Fired Italian Bistro
Direccion: Il Galeone Commercial Center 50 meters north of Pops ice-cream, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: After a long travel day, we stumbled into Cafe Napoli almost by accident, just looking for a quick meal after a day of little more than airplane pretzels......we found this lovely cafe where we were served fresh, delicious pizzas that we watched being made & baked in a wood fired oven. Service was friendly & quick (although we were some of the only folks there...late afternoon, not quite time for the dinner rush.). Our daughter enjoyed a fresh fruit smoothie while we waited for pizzas. Reasonable priced, and our portions gave us enough leftovers to have lunch the next day. Cool place, cool atmosphere, we would go back!

Nombre: Cafe Napoli - Wood Fired Italian Bistro
Direccion: Il Galeone Commercial Center 50 meters north of Pops ice-cream, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Me and my wife just walk in to this amazing place and we found such a high quality restaurant.5 star for the food 5 star for the service 5 star for the presentation They just have everything inside!!!We loved it and we will surely visit this place next time . Highly recommended.Enjoy :)

Nombre: Cafe Napoli - Wood Fired Italian Bistro
Direccion: Il Galeone Commercial Center 50 meters north of Pops ice-cream, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Prior to this I have never had a breakfasts served on a skillet baked in a pizza oven, but OMG it's all I want to eat now! It was so good I came back 3 days in a row. I tried the Mexican eggs, they were great, mildly spicy with avocado. The next day I tried the french toast, it's served with fresh wild berry sauce it's so delicious! And lastly I tried the huevos rancheros, I loved that they bake their own corn tortillas for this dish. They also have free organic coffee which was delicious and fresh orange juice and carrot juice. I had a mimosa, after all, when on vacation (-; I haven't had a chance to try their lunch menu, hopefully next time

Direccion: Jaco Walk, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Se los recomiendo al 100 servicio rápido el camarero muy amable y la comida muy buena con ingredientes de calidad

Direccion: Jaco Walk, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: First week the bagels and service were great but things have gone seriously down hill. Just ordered two lox bagels and they toasted the lox and cream cheese so that the cream cheese was melted and the lox cooked through. The cook/server did not know how to ring up the order and the store was amazingly hot inside. At first I ordered an egg bagel and he had to ask another guy if they had eggs and then he told me they didn't have spinach for the egg/spinach/mushroom bagel. Hopefully they can turn things around here becuase they have a lot of potential.

Direccion: Jaco Walk, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: I got a bagel with eggs and spinach - it was a excellent sandwich and I will come back tomorrow and try some other other bagels - had the garlic bagel was very good - a pleasant surprise- Bagels in Jaco fantastic idea - air conditioning also !

Direccion: Croc's Casino and Resort, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: El visitar Parsley and Pepper, en el Croc¨s Casino en la preciosa playa de Jacó fue una linda experiencia, pues la comida estaba muy rica y el lugar precioso. La atención fue también muy buena.

Direccion: Croc's Casino and Resort, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: La atención fue muy buena, el mesero que nos atendió nos dio muy buenas recomendaciones. Comimos como entrada una crema de espárragos, de plato fuerte un filete Mignon y un Pulpo al grill, de postre una Panna cotta de frutos rojos. Debo resaltar que la panna cota es DELICIOSA, para los que no somos tan amantes del dulce y nos gusta el ácido ésta es la mezcla perfecta.

Direccion: Croc's Casino and Resort, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: This was a 2nd visit and it was just as good. The service was good and the staff was attentive. The view out to the pool is fantastic, I love the floor to ceiling windows.

Direccion: Croc's Casino and Resort, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: My food was great, not cheap but very very good. However the service needs some help. Basically one waiter in the restaurant, 6+ large tables.I don't blame waiter. I blame management. I finally had to get up and go to bar for beer. Drinks arrived well after appetizer. Guess they come from different location.....Waiter did bring me water which was under his control..

Direccion: Croc's Casino and Resort, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Was not happy at all..the Octopus was rubbery and overcooked .Also my brandy shrimp in cream sauce with the yuka mash .was small An expensive .Also the hotel people are not that friendly .I would never stay at this hotel either .Just saying it's a crock of s***

Direccion: Croc's Casino and Resort, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: This restaurant is inside Crocs casino and it is a bit pricey. The wine was fantastic and reasonably priced . We got the salmon Capri to start and it was delicious , the pesto was fantastic . We also had the potatoes 3 ways , the mashed potatoes were cold, which I wasn't expecting but the flavours were phenomenal. I had the seafood stew as my entree because I wasn't very hungry,it was a small portion and it was very flavour , filled with seafood . Our waiter was Gabriel and he was so sweet and friendly . Very vibrant and full of energy . The wait staff did an excellent job, very professional and classy.

Direccion: Croc's Casino and Resort, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: This restaurant is clean and nice and perfectly fine for a meal if you happen to be in the casino or any nearby lodging. It could be in any hotel anywhere. That being said, the service was very attentive and friendly. The bread and hummus-type dip we were given before our meals were both quite delicious. Our meals were tasty. Mine was a Californian Burger (a chicken sandwich on an interesting black roll with warm homemade potato chips) and was very good. Although you are in Costa Rica, you will pay U.S. prices. American Express is accepted which is not the case in many CR businesses. All in all, a pleasant meal.

Direccion: Calle Bohio, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Los precios un poquito altos pero los platos son grandes...se compensan. Pedimos respeto y papás arregladas y ambos estaban muy buenos. El servicio excelente muy amable el muchacho q nos atendió. Muy buena variedad de opciones para esocger

Direccion: Calle Bohio, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Y lo que pasó es que la comida es buena y todo pero los precios están demasiado altos, caros tomar refresco en el local sale demasiado caro.

Direccion: Calle Bohio, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: It's a safe local Soda type restaurant with a Mexican twist. Food was good and service was pleasant. I will return.

Direccion: Downtown Jaco, Calle Pastor Diaz, Behind Orange Pub Infront of Calle Bohio, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Fui con mis tres hijos a cenar y estuvo excelente. Buenos precios, con servicio muy atento. Cócteles baratos y un atún buenísimo. Muy recomendado

Direccion: Downtown Jaco, Calle Pastor Diaz, Behind Orange Pub Infront of Calle Bohio, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: we went to this place several years ago and it had the best food in the area and i and my family really recommend it. they have fantastic fish as well as drinks

Direccion: Downtown Jaco, Calle Pastor Diaz, Behind Orange Pub Infront of Calle Bohio, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: My family loved Shaka's! Happy Hour is a great deal with incredible drinks, especially the signature drink "Shaka"! The food is excellent, they have a small menu but they do it well. The staff is amazing, friendly and helpful (shout out to Danielle!).The atmosphere is amazing, set back off a small side street this outdoor venue is peaceful and quiet, the perfect place to relax after a day of surfing!

Direccion: Downtown Jaco, Calle Pastor Diaz, Behind Orange Pub Infront of Calle Bohio, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: The burgers are really good, probably the best we've had in Costa Rica. My girlfriend loved the 2 for 1 cocktails at Happy hour (4-6). The server was friendly and the place was super cool. It's set back from the street in this garden zone with cool trees which was a really nice change from the loud dusty Main Street places

Nombre: Restaurante Não Sei Wine Bar Tapas
Direccion: Centro Comercial Jaco Town, Restaurante Não Sei, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Comida portuguesa deliciosa hecha por un portugués, buenos vinos, aire acondicionado, ademas todas las carnes y embutidos que venden son hechos  por el chef y de cura 100% natural muy recomendable

Direccion: primera planta del gimnasio Platinun, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: This is usually my first stop when I get to Jaco ! then off to the beach for sunset ! always a great start to my time on the central pacific coast. Karla the owner is very friendly and is never afraid of special orders, and her seafood was caught that morning !!!.

Direccion: primera planta del gimnasio Platinun, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: I'll start by saying their food is really yummy, healthy, and fresh. However, we waited for an hour to get basic items - a salad and a poke bowl. The second time I went there we had the same issue, and after waiting 45+ minutes they said they were out of chicken for my sandwich. We were the only customers at the restaurant. I'd suggest they add some more indoor seating, spend more time training employees, and find a way to cut down on wait times!

Direccion: primera planta del gimnasio Platinun, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: I have been in the Jaco area for a month or so and hands down the best ceviche around is by Karla at the holaloha. I've had it several times and it was always good.

Direccion: primera planta del gimnasio Platinun, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: We went to Holaloha because it was close to where we were staying and was a convenient 10-minute walk. We went for lunch on a Saturday. Sorry, they didn't have roast beef sandwiches. Sorry, they didn't have any ham for ham & cheese sandwiches. The only type of sandwich you could get was chicken. Seriously, on the weekends Jaco doubles in size due to all the visitors and this business can only serve chicken sandwiches. I predict it will not last long if it can't live up to it's menu offerings. Extremely frustrating and disappointing. Shame on you Holaloha

Direccion: primera planta del gimnasio Platinun, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: We visited Jaco for two weeks and ate at this restaurant everyday! My kids favourite was the wild coco and my wife liked the green monster, I tried a little bit of everything and was never disappointed! The price is very good and the food is healthy and delicious! We need more Holalohas!!!

Direccion: primera planta del gimnasio Platinun, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: By far the best bowls in Jaco. It's a cool tiny place that does it right. The roast beef sandwich rocks. Get there early, go often.

Direccion: primera planta del gimnasio Platinun, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Went here for an evening meal with someone recovering from food poisoning. The woman working (owner?) Was so kind and attentive to all our requests of taking stuff in and out of their menu items and the salads were beautifully made with all freshly cooked and chopped ingredients to order. The smoothie and juices we had were both refreshing and very well balanced (not too sweet or overpowering). Delicious little salad bar and can't wait to go back and try their ceviche and other menu items!

Direccion: primera planta del gimnasio Platinun, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: If you have not been there yet... GOOOOO!!! The ceviche is just DELICIOUS and the staff service is a really nice one. The ambiance there is beautiful, but if you are looking for a healthy choice, but also a tasty one... THIS IS THE PLACE TO BE!

Direccion: Av Pastor Diaz, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: No soy de visitar este tipo de lugares,pero el concepto en detalle de su atención en el VIP , el ambiente,música,anfitriones,seguridad nos hicieron pasar un rato de diversión. Gracias

Direccion: Av Pastor Diaz, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Bar con buen ambiente para tomar una cervecita y picotear algo.Destaco la música reggae de Jimmy y la atención de la mesera Maria que nos atendió de maravilla.Seguro repetiremos cuando estemos de vuelta.

Direccion: Av Pastor Diaz, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Excelente atención, aún mejor la comida! Los tragos muy buenos y todo a un precio bastante razonable.MUY recomendado!

Direccion: Av Pastor Diaz, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: This was a nice little surprise on our trip to Jaco. My family and I came to Jaco for shopping on a Saturday morning and I stopped at the outdoor bar for an iced latte. The bartender made me an excellent latte and was very kind. After a long, hot day of shopping, we stopped back into the bar for drinks. The bartender was SO friendly and he made my friend the best margaritas she has EVER had, according to her! Seriously, the service here at this bar was outstanding! The atmosphere is nice, and it's a great place to cool down on a hot day.

Direccion: Avenida Pastor Díaz 500 Metros Al Sur De La Municipalidad, A La Par Del Hotel Encanto., Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Un viaje a los sabores clasicos de España, recomiendo probar las croquetas, las tablas de quesos y embutidos y por supuesto el jamón iberico. La atencion es exelente. Sitio ideal para pasar un momento agradable en familia o con amigos.

Direccion: de maxipali 800 metros oeste en el epicentro civico por la paz jaco, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: La Soda Tío Pancho se distingue por su buena comida y atención de sus propietarios. Es un sitio popular de gama baja de precios muy asequibles para nuestros bolsillos.

Direccion: de maxipali 800 metros oeste en el epicentro civico por la paz jaco, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: los patacones y las hamburguesas muy buenas. todo muy limpio y precios super accesibles. un poco alejado del centro de jaco pero la verdad vale la pena ir a almorzar  ahi o tomarse un cafecito, tambn venden reposteria

Direccion: de maxipali 800 metros oeste en el epicentro civico por la paz jaco, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: i had enough food for another meal, and very tasteful i might add, the cost and the portions, made a very valued meal

Direccion: de maxipali 800 metros oeste en el epicentro civico por la paz jaco, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: We were wondering around Jaco Beach and stumbled upon this restaurant. There was a good variety of food to choose from and I have 3 different options and drink/dessert probably spent under $10 usd, not sure the equivalent in Colones but very reasonable.

Direccion: de maxipali 800 metros oeste en el epicentro civico por la paz jaco, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Went here for about 5 nights was delicious and cheap like $15 for two people with sodas no alcohol served but food made up for that

Direccion: Jaco Centro, diagonal a Mas x Menos Frente a Musi Local Esquinero, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Lugar sobrio y prolijo.Excelente sabores, me encanta ir para comer rico y disfrutar los excelentes sabores y frescos productos de calidad. Desde la entrada plato principal y postres.Es riquisimo ir a comer y disfrutar los sabores (fiesta de sabores en tu paladar) Es para ir y comer rico y sabroso. Sabores y productos frescos.Todo es realmente muy recomensable, desde el ceviche clasico, o sorpresata de langostinos hasta un salmon a lo macho. El Suspiro limeño un placer en el paladar.Sin dudas volveremos. Hay un mozo de destacada atencion y experiencia al momento de atender. Exquisitos sabores.

Direccion: Jaco Centro, diagonal a Mas x Menos Frente a Musi Local Esquinero, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Rica comida,pero atención de parte de una americana fue horrible,Fumaba,mi bb no aguantaba ese humo,y nos hizo regado un refresco en la mesa y aparte odiosa la nena !!!!

Direccion: Jaco Centro, diagonal a Mas x Menos Frente a Musi Local Esquinero, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Fuimos a comer a este restaurante en octobre 4 despues de tomar nuestra orden no vimos el primer Plato despues de 45 min.mas de una hora para que llege el 2 lo peor de todo es que nunca llego el 3 plato.un servico horrible nadie en el restaurante nos dio una explicacion.dejan bien mal el nombre de Peru.no vallan a este restaurante

Direccion: Jaco Centro, diagonal a Mas x Menos Frente a Musi Local Esquinero, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: ¡El ceviche recién hecho y el tiradito en salsa de aji amarillo excelentes! Sin duda un buen lugar para venir y disfrutar del sabor peruano.

Direccion: Jaco Centro, diagonal a Mas x Menos Frente a Musi Local Esquinero, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Vale la pena probar la comida peruana. He pasado a este restaurante varias veces y la comida es deliciosa, el ceviche de pescado fresco y hecho en el momento es genial. El Lomo saltado estaba jugoso y suave .A pesar de que el lugar está ubicado en el centro existe una muy buena relación entre el precio y el plato.Lo recomiendo!

Direccion: Jaco Centro, diagonal a Mas x Menos Frente a Musi Local Esquinero, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Food was fresh and delicious had the lomo saltado and friend had ceviche. LA was patient, funny and helped us, all her recommendations were on point.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: El día 20 julio fuimos en familia y tardaron más de una hora para servirnos la comida, cuando la comida llego nos faltó mi plato después de cómo 20 minutos más me llevaron el plato que faltaba, toda la comida estaba horrible, las hamburguesas no tenían nada en el pan las papas de todos los platos estaba recalentadas horribles no sabían a nada y la mayoría estaban quemadas, cuando pusimos la queja nos dijeron que disculpara pero que en la cocina estaban como locos porque llegaron dos mesas grandes excusas no válidas para un restaurante y lo que resolvieron fue no cobrarnos una orden de papas, pague casi treinta mil cólones por una comida incomible. Si no me fui del lugar fue porque andábamos con niño que tenía mucha hambre y ya se nos había hecho muy tarde para buscar comida en otro lado. Jamás volveré pésimo Restaurante

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Probamos de comer en este Restaurante, cuyos precios ya no son los del pueblo de Quepo, el casado cuesta 3500 colones, mas servicio obligatorio, propina, lo que ya no deja los precios tan populares. De todas formas, mi esposa se comió una ensalada de Palmitos y yo, un arroz con pollo. Servicio correcto y rápido.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: El restaurante está muy bien ubicado, es una opción buena en relación a la calidad/precio.Una de sus especialidades es el pescado entero frito y de verdad muy bueno y en variedad de tamaños.El servicio atento y rápido.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Muy demorada la comida servicio deja mucho que desear Esperamos más de 1 hora así que llénese de paciencia No entre si tiene hambre puede morir o puede pasar al supermercado de al frente y comprar algo Es caro para el tipo de restaurante dos platos una cerveza y una cocacola 42 USDBusque otro

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: La atención apenas suficiente. La relación calidad/precio ligeramente baja con relación a otros restaurantes de su categoría en Jacó. Hubo que devolver un plato porque el filet de Dorado estaba muy cocinado y con la piel quemada.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Pedimos fresa en leche y fue casi en agua, el filete de pescado con los vegetales fríos. No lo recomiendo ....

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Wowowowow luego de conocer este lugar , no querrás comer en otro sitio , la comida es deliciosa y preparada de una forma exelente , además que la atención es muy amable , este lugar sin duda es el mejor

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: La verdad fue mejor de lo esperado, nos recomendaron el lugar y no fue para menos! El arroz con mariscos 👌 delicioso! Y la atención increíble!

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Esta vez fue la mejor chuleta que he comido en la vida, mi pareja y yo lo disfrutamos cada vez que vamos

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Horrible lugar. El servicio al cliente es malísimo, no son atentos a la hora de tomar la orden y duran horas para traer la comida tras de que se le pide comida para 2 personas y traen solo para una y la que atiende sale con la excusa de que"pensó" en lugar de preguntar lo que uno pide por si alguna duda. Carísimo y comida espantosa. No lo recomiendo para nada. Menos el pescado juegan de "plato fino" lleno de escamas e incomible -.- LACRAS que son. No son atentos cuando uno los llama pero buenos usando se trata de cobrar.Hay lugares más sencillos y ricos para comer y barato donde le dan al cliente lo que pide!!!

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Un restaurante con muy buenos precios y excelente comida, muy bien decorado para la ocasión y su personal con el mejor trato.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Fue horrible, primero el mesero no se sabía el menú así que hacíamos preguntas y no podía contestar, además de que era lento, cuando por fin pudimos ordenar tuvimos que esperar como si todo lo hicieran en el momento pero cuando llego el primer plato (un ceviche) vimos que llevaba horas preparado, no tenía sabor y solo nos dieron un paquete de sodas (galletas) cuando pedimos otro el mesero nos rodo los ojos y tardo 15 minutos en traer otras! Después llego el segundo plato un arroz con camarones, estaba completamente desabrido! Una decepción! Hay muchos restaurantes mejores en jaco! No se los recomiendo!

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: He visitado tres veces este restaurante en diferentes momentos del año 2015 e inicio del 2016. La comida es buena (por eso hemos vuelto), pero hay algo que siempre fue igual : el tiempo para servir la orden es demasiado, y en ocasiones sirven primero a mesas que ordenaron después de uno. Poca cantidad de meseros hacen que se vean corriendo de un lado al otro tratando de atender las consultas de ¿falta mucho para que me sirvan?. Conclusión : si no tiene prisa por comer, vaya.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Mi novio y yo decidimos ir a comer en la noche y caminamos porque temprano habíamos tenido una decepción y vimos este lugar, yo andaba con un antojo tremendo de pescado entero, debo decir que fue justo como lo quería, estaba delicioso, los precios muy acorde con la calidad y la cantidad de comida, los cocteles bien hechos y el servicio espectacular.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: La verdad muy buen sabor de la Mariscada que comí excelente, no obstante mi esposa pidió un arroz con camarones pero me comentó que no sabía bien que le puso Chile para darle sabor el ceviche era de un tamaño grande

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Me gusto la comida, los camarones estaban muy buenos, pero la atención no me gusto y el precio muy alto para el servicio que ofrecen.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: No encontrará precios mejores en mariscos, con una calidad excelente. Creo deben mejorar los jugos y las ensaladas, pero el pescado es muy fresco y bien preparado.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Buen precio , la atención del personal excelente! Pueden mejorar los refrescos naturales,pero la comida es buena , los platos de niños no son pequeños . Todos muy amables! Comida típica costarricense.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Si no encuentras comida y donde dormir en jaco a altas horas de la noche. Este lugar es una excelente opción de precio y calidad. El único problema es que la música es seriamente ruidosa y la apagan a las 3:00am.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Nosotros llegamos super tarde a Jaco y conseguimos este sitio. Económico. Higiénico y con aire. Aunque al entrar al sitio de una mala impresión, luego del restaurante las cabinas están muy bien. El unico contra es que como las cabinas el recreo, estan al lado del restaurante. Se escucha la música completo, la cual esta activa hasta las 2:30am. Pero excelente sitio.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Una delicia, la verdad es que todo el viaje busque un buen trozo de pescado y este filet se llevo un 100. Acompañado de guarnición y mariscos en salsa blanca una verdadera delicia de jaco...

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Went to this place for a late lunch. We ordered Palmito salad which was quite pricey. What we got was mostly lettice, a bit of tomato and very little palmito, obviously conserves. The worst palmito salad I have eaten. Napkins were suitable for a coffee break, not for a meal. Spaghetti Carbonara was OK, not very tasty. Drinks were overprized for what you got. If you eat to survive it’s good enough, if you want a bit more, find another place. Most restaurants in Jaco are better than this one.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: The grilled sea bass with garlic butter was very tasty and cooked just right.  The margaritas were also .

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: After ordering 3 different items off the menu (which they didn’t have) we ordered chicken with rice. Was so bad, a pile of rice with a few bits of chicken with absolutely no flavour and about a litre of oil mixed in. Definitively avoid eating here!

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: There were 3 of us and to make it simple. We all ordered the same exact "Ribeye" steak. It was the worst meat I have ever had...not even sure it was beef. Disgusting ! None of us ate more than a few bites. They noticed yet didn't even offer something else. We paid our bill and left. Would never ever go back and recommend no one else does either.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Food has no flavour, they don’t use any spices , it’s not cheap , the staff where nice it’s not there fault the food is bad

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Mauvais accueil, plats surgelés réchauffés, prix excessif pour la qualité auxquels il faut rajouter 10% pour le service ... Run away, frozen food reheated, excessive price for what it is, and you have to pay 10% more for the service which is really bad...

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: The thing about this place is that the waiters were realllly weird. They were unbelievably awkward and strange but not rude or anything, just socially weird. The piña colada I had was really good, but my friends got mojitos that werent mixed very well. I had a really greasy yet delicious quesadilla that I couldnt even finish while stoned cuz it was so much food! The fries were great, also. Overall pretty great food, but a weird atmosphere and strange staff...

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: We needed to find a reasonable place for lunch and were very pleased with El Recreo. Our waiter, Carlos, was not only helpful, but spoke very good English and went out of his way to welcome us and help us. We had the typical "plate of the day" lunchtime special which was excellent and a great value. Everything was fresh and tasty. Then Carlos got us a reduced rate taxi ride with a trusted friend to our hotel. Very pleasant experience and we would definitely go back!!

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Outstanding food and service.  I had the pork chop, my wife had rice with chicken.  Both were very enjoyable.  And the prices were extremely reasonable.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: We went last night and had an amazing and very tasty whole fish, the prices are very fair, the portions of the food are big and they have an excellent service.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: After taking an evening walk we decided to eat at El Recreo and let me tell you we were impressed with all of our orders, our waiter was awesome he provided helpful tips on places to go and provided a map to show us how to get there. If you go to Jaco it is a good place to eat!!

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Went back twice for the whole sea bass.  Fried whole fish on the plate with French fries and salad, really good.  Waiters super friendly.  Mixed seafood ceviche was excellent.  Add a couple of Imperials and it was muy bien.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: This restaurant does not look like much, but it is fabulous! Service was excellent, and the food was great. The smoothies were the best we have ever had, and made fresh to deliver. The souvenir shop is priced fairly and the hammocks are a great resting place.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Ordered fish fillet with cream sauce clams and shrimp, the clams were minuscule, shrimp were good. The rice and shrimp dish was bland; added lots of hot sauce to boost flavour. The salad that came with the meal was shredded cabbage and a slice of tomato.Keep walking there are too many nice places to eat in Jaco to waste your evening.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: My friend and I stopped at El Recreo for Lunch. There were a few tables taken but it did not look busy. We tried to order fresh juice but the server told us they didn't have any of the 3 fruits we requested (also advertised in the menu). We asked for recommendations and we were told he didn't have any. Finally we settled on a dish but we were told they didn't have it yet. We then decided to simply order a "casado" typical Costa Rican Dish. The food was unbelievably good. We had "casado" at different places in Costa Rica and the one at El Recreo was our favorite. The meat was tender and very flavorful. We waited a while to get the bill. We had to flag the server down. Would highly recommend the food but go in expecting mediocre service.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: My wife and I had sea bass in a shrimp and little neck clam sauce. Large serving with numerous clams and shrimp, fresh vegetables, and rice. Including a beer and margarita cost about $32. Owner Elmer spoke no English but his daughter Sabrina was fluent. Wait staff was attentive. Will eat there again.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Came into Jaco for lunch. Found the busiest restaurant to eat. Pleasantly good.. I had Fried porkchops they were a 10! Husband had ceviche! Good! Daughter had octopus ceviche! Says good! Friend Sam had fish fillet in garlic butter delicious! Prices great! We would come back

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: My wife and I attended El Recreo in Jaco as we were hankering for a good seafood dinner. We came away with a GREAT one!The fish cerviche was a light appetizer that we both enjoyed.We both had the seafood plate which comes with a small lobster tail and it was delicious!A coconut flan for dessert - which was truly wonderful - and we were stuffed.No coffee, oddly enough, so that was a bit of a disappointment.Perhaps a touch pricey, but nothing outrageous.If you're in the mood for some seafood, highly recommend this restaurant.Service was friendly

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: The food had great flavor and the price was good but the portion size could have been bigger. At least I had room for ice cream.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: This was the last meal together for my wedding party of about 18 adults. It was the worst experience I may have ever had at a restaurant. The server (owner) pumped everyone up about the size and quality of the "jumbo" lobster. We all paid nearly $60 USD per lobster. When we got the food, it was such a small portion, you could finish the entire thing in two bites. These lobsters were jumbo like Kate Moss on a bender. Although after the first bite, half of us spit the food back on the plate since the lobster had turned and gone bad. We told the server Eugene, and he said too bad, that's what you ordered. The entire party was furious. Nobody wanted to pay the bill, but being that we were in a foreign country, the risk wasn't worth it. Basically this place swindled nearly $1,500 out of a group of unsuspecting tourists without any regard for the disgusting garbage they put on a plate. Three people in the group got sick from the food as well. This place should be ashamed of themselves. I wish I would have read a review before taking my group here. Absolutely the worst pretend restaurant I've ever seen. Also cockroaches in the bathrooms. Please just keep walking.

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: So for 32 bucks we got three plates, 2 for adults one for our daughter....French fries were over cooked, fish wasn't fresh, rice was not good either.We end up returning some stuff but what we got was not any near to average so we just walked away leaving the food there.Not recommended!

Tipo_Comida: Centroamericana, Costarricense, Latina, Mariscos, Española, Sudamericana
Direccion: Jaco Centro Frente Al Mas Por Menos 20 Hill Lane, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Great Costa Rican cuisine, quiet atmosphere, staff was friendly and helpful. Our witer Mario was extremely nice and answered many questions. He went out of his way. Prices were excellent.

Direccion: Jaco Walk, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Vida Pura is a small food stall in Jaco Walk. They offer a wide range of natural desserts for people with dietry restrictions and healthy juices. The server was really knowledgeable and could list the ingredients of everything on offer. I recommend everyone to try Vida Pura !

Direccion: Jaco Walk, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Wonderful juices and healthy delicious superfood snacks. Perfect post yoga/gym spot, friendly and quick. New favorite!

Direccion: Jaco Walk, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: All Vegan.. Juices, treats and snacks, not meals.. Very friendly.. It is along Jaco Walk across from Opticas Vision

Direccion: Calle Bohio, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: ....stop by for some fabulous 'liquor-infused' ice cream...yes, this place has booze in its large selection of flavor profiles. Great treat on a sunny afternoon when walking along the avenue. Try the dulce leche....excellent.

Direccion: Calle Bohio, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Fun selections of ice creams, with and wiout liquor, the Dulce the leche is THE BEST dulce de leche ice cream I have ever had. Amazing Flavor

Direccion: Calle Bohio, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Was heading towards Jaco beach and saw this little ice cream shop offering varietyOf liquor infused and non alcoholic version of ice cream - tried their coconut Malibu and strawberry vodka- and must say they tasted fresh and little hint of alcohol

Direccion: Calle Bohio, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: They have a large selection of flavors and with it being a warm place, ice cream is perfect to havee

Direccion: Jaco Walk, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Great and freshHad lunch, breakfast and dinner here on several occasions. Massive tacos. Fresh quality. And nice salad bar to add on the toppings or sides (chillies, salads, greens and more). Easy to grab a burrito to go, or sit and enjoy people watching at the plaza.

Direccion: Jaco Walk, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Plenty of taco joints at Jacó but this one tastes different. Had the crispy mahi mahi which was just perfect. Beware portion sizes are big (2 tacos was more than enough for me). Also the place has really cool vibe and atmosphere.

Direccion: 150 Meters South West Of Municipalidad Jaco, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Muy Bonito lugar para ir en familia y con los hijitos peludos . Únicamente me hubiera gustado que las perritas hubieran podido andar sueltas.  Tambien sería bueno  poner cerca de la piscina lugares para amarrar las mascotas.

Direccion: 150 Meters South West Of Municipalidad Jaco, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: El restaurante es normal, a la hora del buffet sirven poco para ver como se va vendiendo y si llega mucha gente no alcanza y toca esperar, el café feo, u las instalaciones viejas, el bar que esta a la par no es bueno, es apenas por si lo ocupas

Direccion: 150 Meters South West Of Municipalidad Jaco, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: A huge thank you to Shannon and Roxana in making our daughter’s wedding reception a relaxing way to top off her special day. The care that was given was remarkable. Planning in advance, reserving tables for our group, even on an expected busy night. Offering to set up the area with table cloths, and setting up a great wait staff. Taking time to go out of their way to add flowers to the cake, and write the bride and grooms names in icing on the cake as well as storing and serving it for us was above and beyond. What a captivating way to end the busy day, listening to the waves crashing in the back ground, enjoying a cocktail followed by the delicious buffet. In addition to the ceviche and other salads, Shannon served flank steak with caramelized onions, chicken, mashed casaba/yucca, vegetables and dessert. We had a wonderful time. Thank you for the enjoyable evening and the unforgettable memories.

Direccion: 150 Meters South West Of Municipalidad Jaco, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Three times a day buffet was very tasty. Breakfast was very good. Lunch and dinner were more than adequate and always tasted good. Not a huge selection of food but what they had they did well.

Direccion: 150 Meters South West Of Municipalidad Jaco, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: This restaurant was at our motel. We only ate buffet breakfast that was offered and ate out all other times. The same thing is offered everyday and nothing spectacular. Yes, you have to make sure your omelet is not over cooked. The location open air and is in the back of the property on an inlet.

Direccion: 150 Meters South West Of Municipalidad Jaco, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: This restaurant is at our hotel. The food selection is basic and tasted the same. The breakfast buffet was good but they had an omelet station and the chef did not know how to make omelets, it seemed. Even after another employee explained it to her (in spanish as she didn't speak english) she still wasn't sure what to do. It was no big deal to us but maybe they do omelet's different in their country. Service was quick.

Direccion: 150 Meters South West Of Municipalidad Jaco, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: The breakfast was ok but they were always running out of food and the 3 days the menu never changed. Wasn't impress with the dinner menu. With all the new building if they want to keep open . They better change dinner menu and it was over price. I looked at the menu and walked out

Direccion: 150 Meters South West Of Municipalidad Jaco, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: From the omelette and pancakes to the Seafood soup. It was amazing. Every meal was delicious. I felt like I was at a five star restaurant.

Direccion: 150 Meters South West Of Municipalidad Jaco, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: The food at this restaurant is extremely good and tasty. We have been to many restaurant in Jaco and our favorite is Blacks Beard Restaurant. Good menu, good staff and the chef is eager to please.

Direccion: Pastor Diaz ave, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Anteriormente creo que en otra administración había ido, estuve bien, esta última vez no me gusto mucho, los ceviches si son buenos, y las debidas siempre bien frías.El servio muy lento, el parrillero Elmer, da muy mala imagen al lugar, se ve trabaja bajo los efectos de lasDrogas.Deberían poner más cuidado al tipo de empleados que contratar. Por personas así le lugar va mala imagen. Jamás lo recomendaría.

Direccion: Pastor Diaz ave, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Stayed there with my husband, food's proportion was exactly what we expected, prices were reasonable, night entertainment involved a barbecue, great music and karaoke, we were there for a short visit and ended up not even leaving the premises, fully recommended! We book an apt via regular apps.

Direccion: Pastor Diaz ave, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: On the Main Street of Jaco you’ll find Las Olas. During our stay in Jaco we ate there twice because of the delicious food and value! The portions were large! You can certainly split the Nachos that we’re piled high on the plate. Everything was so fresh. You won’t be disappointed!

Direccion: Pastor Diaz ave, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: We stopped here on our way back to San Jose from Manuel Antonio. We had been here 2 years ago and enjoyed the experience so decided to come back. My mom, husband and I all ordered the chifrijo...a typical Costa Rican dish...while my son had shrimp and rice. We were all very satisfied and the jugos naturales were delicious. It was nice to chat with the owner and hear how he has been making improvements with the place since he took it over 2.5 year ago. If we head back to the area we will definitely stop in again. No 5 stars because they did not have the sushi that was offered on the menu...but that’s the only reason why.

Direccion: Avenida Pastor Diaz, Frente a Republik, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Excelentes crepas. Sin duda las mejores de Jacó. Hechas al momento , dulces y saladas. Muy ricas!! Cafes muy buenos,capuccino, espresso y más. Muy recomendable.

Direccion: Avenida Pastor Diaz, Frente a Republik, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Went there and got a wrap for lunch. Took a bite and noticed something hard in my mouth - a toothpick. Somehow a toothpick was in my wrap. Minus the toothpick the wrap was very average. Wont be going back.

Direccion: Avenida Pastor Diaz, Frente a Republik, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Sooooo good. Myself and about 7 other adults in a tour group went here one night and WOW!!! Sooo tasty and great service!

Direccion: Avenida Pastor Diaz, Frente a Republik, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: This is a great shop on the main strip of Jaco. It opens at 2pm and serves great dinner or desert crepes. The prices are great. Two people can eat for under $12.

Direccion: 9 Km 300 Mts Este E la Municipalidad de Jaco 69, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: El ambiente es muy agradable. El personal bastante atento y la comida es lo esperado. Sugiero mayor variedad en postres

Direccion: 9 Km 300 Mts Este E la Municipalidad de Jaco 69, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Buena variedad de comida española, ademas, de una riquisima sangria española. Lugar recomendable para ir en Jaco por Paellas y Tapas.

Direccion: 9 Km 300 Mts Este E la Municipalidad de Jaco 69, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Muy sabroso, algo diferente en Jacó. Muy buen servicio!! Tapas deliciosas como mejillones, pulpo, hongos, tortilla española. Sangría y paella muy ricos.  Definitivamente volveremos.

Direccion: Diagonal Al Parque Municipal, Enfrente de Best Brands Y Beatle Bar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Went for breakfast. Husband had Colombian breakfast. I had French toast and fruit. Food and service were excellent.

Direccion: Diagonal Al Parque Municipal, Enfrente de Best Brands Y Beatle Bar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Very good service and RICA colombian food! Got to come back to try all the fruit juices!!!! Better go hungry because the plates are full!

Direccion: Diagonal Al Parque Municipal, Enfrente de Best Brands Y Beatle Bar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Super sweet staff. I Had lunch and dinner. We ordered lunch at the location and they delivered it to our hotel (Crocs) I went back for dinner and the FAMOUS COLOMBIAN HOT DOG!! Its a party in your mouth!! If you've never had one ITS SOOOO GOOD! It had a zillion toppings that dont make sense ..but when the flavors hit your mouth its AMAZING!! Enjoy! Too bad we are leaving tomorrow and I won the there for the traditional Colombian soup called Sancocho... its great for a hangover! Stop by and enjoy this piece of heaven in Jaco. Thank You Parceros for the yummy 'food.

Direccion: Playa Jaco 600 Este Del Lagar, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 0000 Costa Rica
Comentario: Great food, great service, 10/10. I would definitely come back next time I am in Jaco. It will be hard to finish your food.

Direccion: Hotel Amapola, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Restaurante familiar italiano, la pizza a la leña estaba realmente muy sabrosa, de pasta delgada.El restaurante está en los límites de Jaco pero vale la pena por el sabor y espacio bonito.

Direccion: Hotel Amapola, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Super mal servicio, no tienen nada de variedad. Pedimos y la mesera no sabia absolutamente nada y hasta después que nos tomo la orden como 5 min después no indico que mas de la mitad de lo que pedimos no tenían. Apesar del mal servicio, la pizza es muy buena.

Direccion: 500 Meters East Sobre, C Lapa Verde, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: platillos tipicos super deliciosos a precios super comodos,aqui va de la mano la buena cocina y el buen precio, ambiente agradable y familiar

Direccion: Main Street, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Since last time they have extended their hours to 7 days week. They have the best breads/pastries and their breakfasts are very good. We do our own cooking but get our breads/pastries at this place only.

Direccion: Main Street, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Great service, great food, home made bakery and bread, simply amazing, we went for breakfast, end up buying their home made bread and pastry for the road!Great quality food and service.

Direccion: Main Street, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: This is a couples (he is Argentinian & she is French) bakery. They make the best pastries and bread, but you have to be early as they sell out of everything!We went every morning to get our bread for the day, it was the best!

Direccion: Piedra Bruja, Puntarenas Province, Jaco, Costa Ric, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: This is a place you must visit while in Jaco. It is just a couple of Km out of town on the side of a mountain. The ATV tours in Jaco normally stop here for refreshments, but I was adventurous and used an electric scooter (not recommended) and a GPS/map to go up to it. The roads are kind of rough but fine for a regular vehicle. The service was great. I had the best strawberry margarita there and some good chicken wings. But the view is AMAZING!

Direccion: Calle Pastor Diaz Centro la Ureña, casi frente a la calle el Bohio, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: As a local I know all the good spots, this is one of the great ones,, Cuisine from Peru is very unique, Owner operated and a very nice and clean place, I recommended for a great lunch or Dinner

Direccion: Calle Pastor Diaz Centro la Ureña, casi frente a la calle el Bohio, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Small place, difficult to find, but fresh and open kitchen.The food is simply delicious! Peruvian dishes and fresh products.

Direccion: Jaco Walk Local 60, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: This is a small family run food outlet in Jaco Walk.Food is good and their chimichanga is the closest I have found to one in the US. Outdoor seating with friendly family service. Worth looking for.

Nombre: Bar and Restaurant at Hotel Buddha House
Tipo_Comida: Francesa, Peruana, Fusión, Argentina, Sudamericana, Costarricense
Direccion: Pastor Diaz and Calle Bohio Beside Orange Pub and Beach House Clothes Store, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: El lugar me pareció bastante bonito. Y el personal muy simpáticos con carisma y muy respetuosos. Las instalaciones me parecen bastante románticas.

Tipo_Comida: Estadounidense, Café, Comida rápida, Sudamericana, Costarricense
Direccion: Avenida Pastor Diaz, centro comercial Urena Local #7 y #8, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Wonderful fish tacos and ceviche at great prices. Service was a little slow but well worth the wait. I gave service 5 stars because one of our party was allergic to gluten and even though they did not normally prepare the fish tacos with corn tortillas, they were able to find some and make sure my friend had something to eat. Would definitely recommend.

Direccion: En Frente de Mas X Menos Jaco Centro, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Mi esposo y yo andábamos buscando un lugar para almorzar, siendo vegetarianos se nos complicó un poco encontrar algo. Decidimos entrar a este local por el simpático dueño, y ordenamos una pizza de espinaca, lastimosamente duró mucho en entregarla y su sabor no era tan bueno. Cortésmente me obsequió otra bebida de guanabana (deliciosa).

Direccion: En Frente de Mas X Menos Jaco Centro, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: I walking down the main street in Jaco, and I bump into this jewel. The food was excelent, and the staff was extremely friendly. The food took a little long, but when the food arrived, everything was fresh and had this amazing home-made flavour. I strongly recommend this place! The strawberry-pinapple "batido" was delicious... thank you!

Direccion: En Frente de Mas X Menos Jaco Centro, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: We were walking down the main street in Jaco and found this place. The owner is American and very nice. We got bbq pizza and margarita pizza. They were both delicious. Some of the best pizza I have had. Nice clean restaurant as well.

Direccion: Calle Jardin, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: La Marisquería Raquel es un buen restaurante popular en el centro de Jacó, distinguiéndose por la buena calidad de sus mariscos.

Direccion: Calle Jardin, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Los precios no estan bien para lo que sirven, duran bastante sirviendo la comida, el arroz con camarones parece de restaurante chino

Direccion: Calle Jardin, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: If you are staying in one of the places nearby, this place is handy, and a good value. If you can resist ordering $15-$20 seafood entrees, and order a meal that looks like what a local would order, you'll find you can get plenty to eat, that tastes good, at a really good price.Remember, restaurants in Costa Rica add 10% for service. It's the last item on your bill before the final total.

Direccion: Calle Jardin, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: We stayed down the street at the Bahia Encantada and discoverd this cute little inexpensive restaurant that served breakfast, lunch and dinner in typical Costa Rican style. All dishes served fresh and delicious, proudly presented on white dishes with a flourish. We had egg and ham breakfast burritos and Costa Rican omelettes that were wonderful. Hamburgers were dry--stick with the CR fare. Their casado dinners were large and hearty. Seafood soup and empanadas were especially good. Natural juices are hand made to order and arrive cold and sweet. Friendly, helpful bi-lingual service kept us coming back all week.

Direccion: Centro comercial Urena Jaco, Jaco, Garabito Municipality 61101 Costa Rica
Comentario: Excelente servicio rica comida y excelente atencion al cliente recomendado el ambiente ideal para cenas familiares o sea reunion de ttabajo

Direccion: Av Pastor Diaz, Jacó, Costa Rica, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Pésimo en servicio, comida y precios, aparte del tiempo de espera. La sra salonera,  te termina de quitar las ganas de comer. Para nada lo recomiendo.

Direccion: Av Pastor Diaz, Jacó, Costa Rica, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Nos lo recomendó una amiga que que le había ido bien en algun momento. Pedimos un arroz con mariscos:feo añejo y sin sabor. Buen servicio y me lo cambiaron por unos camarones con arroz súper ricos. Pero pueden ver nuestro review en Instagram y Facebook @tavolorossocr.

Direccion: Av Pastor Diaz, Jacó, Costa Rica, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Si las mejores características son la ubicación y que es un local amplio donde no se siente que se ahogue del calor, pues significa que la comida es regular.A pesar que su nombre habla de mariscos las opciones de estos en el menú son pocas. Lo compensan con un buen servicio y que el platillo lo preparan rápido.

Direccion: Av Pastor Diaz, Jacó, Costa Rica, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Lastimosamente el lugar ofrece pescado fresco y nada que ver. La atención es realmente de baja calidad y tal parece no desean que vuelvas. Lo único rescata-ble es el precio algo comodo,

Direccion: Av Pastor Diaz, Jacó, Costa Rica, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Pésimo Servicio.  Las meseras no están atentas a los clientes. Pedimos una silla de niño y nunca la trajeron

Direccion: Av Pastor Diaz, Jacó, Costa Rica, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Queríamos comer pescado fresco. Preguntamos en la entrada y nos aseguraron que si tenían.Nos trajeron la carta, pedimos las bebidas y cuando quisimos ordenar nos indican que solo tienen TILAPIA!!!Nótese que era sábado a la hora de almuerzo. Un fiasco.

Direccion: Av Pastor Diaz, Jacó, Costa Rica, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: El local está muy céntrico en Jacó. La atención ha sido muy buena. El personal en general muy pendiente de nuestra mesa, tomando nuestros pedidos, dando recomendaciones y aseando la mesa constantemente. El local bastante amplio, con decoración apropiada para la zona. En cuanto a la comida, podríamos decir que va de regular a buena. Faltando un poco de condimento a nuestra opinión. Por lo precios podríamos esperar un poco más de calidad.

Direccion: Av Pastor Diaz, Jacó, Costa Rica, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Este restaurante está bien ubicado en la principal calle de Jacó, es amplio, tiene parqueo privado, su planta física se encuentra en buen estado, el personal es esmerado, los alimentos fueron preparados de manera excelente, pero, tenga en cuenta que si pide un filete de pescado, sólo ofrecen tilapia, si quiere otro tipo como pargo, tiene que ordenar el pescado entero. Si desea bebidas naturales tiene que ser endulzadas con azúcar, ya que no ofrecen edulcorantes artificiales. La carne tenía muy buena textura y una preparación acorde a lo solicitado, viene acompañada de arroz y vegetales. Al igual que los calamares que fueron ordenados.

Direccion: Av Pastor Diaz, Jacó, Costa Rica, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: This is the best place to have that wonderful, local fish fried up into mouth-watering perfection. Street-side, you see which fish is on offer to be sacrificed to the fry basket - usually Pargo (red snapper to us Gringos. Come hungry - it's a large portion.Find a table beneath the fans, expect excellent service, don't be surprised if the local football team arrives for a victory dinner, say 'no, gracias' to the street cigar salesman. Don't overlook this modest looking restaurant because it's the source of GREAT fresh fish.

Direccion: Av Pastor Diaz, Jacó, Costa Rica, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Bad quality of food and terrible presentation. I had a hamburger that was smushed flat and the patty was dry. My husband had a seafood platter with the driest mussels and shrimp. It all tasted old. Not worth recommending.

Direccion: Av Pastor Diaz, Jacó, Costa Rica, Jaco, Garabito Municipality Costa Rica
Comentario: Walking along the main street in Jaco, we had very few options for lunch given that it was New Year's Day, but we saw that Marisqueria El Recreo seemed to be very popular, and mainly with locals.As there were only two of us we managed to get seated relatively quickly while large family groups had to wait longer as most of the big tables seemed to have been reserved.The service was OK - they were very busy and the place was full - and the food was good. It took a little longer than expected to arrive, but under the circumstances this wasn't a problem.One small thing was they they didn't have bottles of red wine - possibly finished off the night before - and yet they would only serve wine by the glass. This was a bit annoying as we had to keep ordering, and waiting for, refills of the 'house' wine which wasn't that great and served to interrupt the normal lunch experience as we were often trying to catch the waitress' attention instead of them giving us a bottle of whatever it was they were serving us.One other thing, that seems to be usual in Costa Rica is when you want to pay with a card, the staff don't often bring the machine to the table - the customer has to go either to the bar where the machine 'lives', or in the case of El Recreo a kind of booth in the corner of the restaurant where all financial transactions get carried out.
